name: 東方圣终仪 ～ TROUBLE LOTUS (Sega Genesis/Mega Drive)
name_original: 東方圣终仪 ～ TROUBLE LOTUS (Sega Genesis/Mega Drive)
description:
COFFEESHOCK! CANNASHOCK!
NOW IS THE TIME TO THE 68000 ASS ON FIRE!

an ongoing chuggy/buggy remake/demake of touhou lotus land story (sans several expected gameplay elements) for the sega genesis/megadrive. this first build -- basic engine & first stage -- made in about four or five very sweaty and confusing days for retro game jam 2021. made with stef's kickass SGDK SDK

d-pad: move reimu
a: shoot
b: focus
c: bomb
start: pause

all code (bad), graphics (bad), sfx (sounds like a toilet), bgm (lmaooo what) by t. boddy
touhou lotus land story, its settings, characters, etc 1998 the ZUN

download rom to play in an emulator, on the web at https://www.emulatrix.net/, or flash it to a cart. tested on north american and japanese ntsc consoles. not tested on pal. sorry!
